title: How to Research KDP Competitors in Seconds (NEW 1-Click Tool!)
description:
In this video, we dive into the tedious process of manual data collection for competitor research. It highlights how time-consuming it is to gather product reviews page by page. Understanding customer feedback is crucial for book creation and business tips.

👑 Join the Royalty Guild: https://www.skool.com/guild
🔗 Download the Extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/royalty-guild-review-coll/ikcabgjljchjihllhedncaiplfmhpmim

The Royalty Guild Review Collector is a Chrome extension designed to streamline your workflow. I'll walk you through:

• How to scrape up to 100 reviews in seconds.
• The 1-click "Temporary Storage" feature.
• Exporting your data to a CSV file.

Pro Tip: How to feed this data into AI models (like ChatGPT or Claude) to find "blind spots" in your niche and write better books!

0:00 Why manual research is holding you back
0:45 Introducing Royalty Guild Review Collector
1:25 How to install and find the extension
